# VisualShaderNodeResizableBase

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeCurveTexture](class_visualshadernodecurvetexture.md), [VisualShaderNodeCurveXYZTexture](class_visualshadernodecurvexyztexture.md), [VisualShaderNodeFrame](class_visualshadernodeframe.md), [VisualShaderNodeGroupBase](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md)

Base class for resizable nodes in a visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Resizable nodes have a handle that allows the user to adjust their size as needed.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
